::DrillBit::

"I dont know, Dark Mouse. But I just recieved a delayed transmission in
my head, from War. It was set to go off when he died, and the base was
destroyed. He gave me the location of Destructors base. We'll wait for
any others, like StarScream who is still missing. Then we'll go."
